data.Name: TradeSatoshi
data.Description: Tradesatoshi | ZEL paired with BTC, LTC, BCH, USDT & DOGE. Medium sized exchange with good uptime and active support.

data.Name: Stocks.Exchange
data.Description: Stocks.Exchange | ZEL paired with BTC. Smaller exchange, first listing for Zelcash.

data.Name: Graviex
data.Description: Graviex | ZEL paired with BTC. Smaller exchange.

data.Name: TradeOrge
data.Description: TradeOrge | ZEL paired with BTC. A young, medium-sized exchange but very fast-growing and popular.

data.Name: BarterDex
data.Description: BarterDex | Multiple pairings. A decentralized exchange (Dex). New version comes with updated UI known as HyperDex.
